review: Chromecaset works so well we pretty much stopped using our apple tv. chrome cast allows any device to cast to your tv so theres no more hunting up the remote, always have a phone or iPad close by and it doesn't drain the battery on the device that you cast from.other pulses are, the hdmi is automatically labeled "chrome cast" and along as the tvs on it will automatically switch to the right hdmi.
